data.text:
@MdFacep @Traveling_89 @TehminaKaoosji Good advice. Maybe I was a bit too confrontational in my approach. 

But thanks for chiming in. Keep up the good work sir!
@volatyl3 @Traveling_89 @TehminaKaoosji You are welcome. Be kind and stay safe.

@MdFacep @Traveling_89 @TehminaKaoosji Thanks Dr. It's getting tiring having to deal with th incessant dear mongering people that are too myopic or misrepresent data n studies.

👍✌️

@volatyl3 @Traveling_89 @TehminaKaoosji Evidence is emerging that demonstrates BA.2 is LESS pathogenic than other VOCs (Variants Of Concern) including Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta and Omicron other sub-lineages 

https://t.co/JQ3LbtIZiJ
